ing: 1 fluid ounce coconut-flavored rum (such as MalibuÂ®)
des: "This amazing cocktail is an at-home easy adaptation of a drink I love! It tastes like sweet coconut and is a real crowd pleaser for those who don't like the taste of traditional alcoholic drinks."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour rum, vanilla schnapps, and cream over the ice. Cover, shake, and strain martini into a cocktail glass.
